info.description: To access endpoints that require authentication, use your application key and secret created in the Dashboard (https://dashboard.yapily.com)
info.title: Yapily API

post.summary: Initiate a new account request for user to authorize

put.summary: Update pre authorize consent for user to authorise account

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Use this parameter to limit account's direct debit results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Use this parameter to limit account's periodic payment order results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Use this parameter to limit account's scheduled payment results

put.summary: Transfer money from one account to another account accessible with the same consent

post.summary: Initiate bulk payment for user to authorise

get.summary: Retrieves a list of categories returned by the Yapily Categorisation engine for a given locale
Get consents sorted by creation date

parameters.name: filter[applicationUserId]
parameters.description: Filter consents by your application user Id (applicationUserId)

parameters.name: filter[userUuid]
parameters.description: Filter consents by Yapily user Id (userUuid)

parameters.name: filter[institution]
parameters.description: Use this parameter to filter consent by institution, using the Yapily institution Id

parameters.name: filter[status]
parameters.description: Use this parameter to filter consent by status

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Use this parameter to filter consents created after the date specified

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Use this parameter to filter consents created before the date specified

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Use this parameter to limit consent results, max limit is 20

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Use this parameter to specify the offset of the results

get.summary: Get details of all user deletion jobs

post.summary: Start a job to delete application users by specifying their identifiers

get.summary: Get details of a user deletion job

Returns the details of the application that owns the request credentials

parameters.name: filter[applicationUserId]
parameters.description: Filter users by the provided application user Id (applicationUserId) when the user was created.

delete.summary: Delete an application user and sub-resources (including consent resources on institution APIs if they exist)

parameters.name: filter[institution]
parameters.description: Use this parameter to filter consent by institution, using the Yapily institution Id. This replaces the deprecated `institutionId` query param.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Use this parameter to limit consent results, max limit is 20

id.description: Account Id returned by the institution if present

description.description: Product name as defined by the financial institution for this account

nickname.description: Name of the account as defined by the financial institution or the end user

details.description:
Specifications that might be provided by the institution
- characteristics of the account
- characteristics of the relevant card

OverdraftOverdraftTierBand.description: Provides overdraft details for a specific tier or band

OtherFeeRateType.description: Other fee rate type code which is not available in the standard code set

InlineResponse2001OtherATMServices.description: Enter a new code , name and description for any other ATM Service

AgeEligibility.description: Age eligibility that a person should be to hold this account

PersonalCurrentAccountBrand.description: Brand registered by the banking group at https://register.fca.org.uk/

OtherBankInterestType.description: Other interest rate types which are not available in the standard code list

userUuid.description: Uuid of the application user who will authorise access to their data. Either the userUuid or applicationUserId must be provided.

applicationUserId.description: Descriptive identifier for the application user.Either the userUuid or applicationUserId must be provided.

userUuid.description: Uuid of the application user who will authorise access to their data. Either the userUuid or applicationUserId must be provided.

applicationUserId.description: Descriptive identifier for the application user.Either the userUuid or applicationUserId must be provided.

Site.description: Used by a Financial Institution internally to identify the location of an ATM.

OtherFeeType.description: Other Fee type which is not available in the standard code set

OtherApplicationFrequency.description: Other application frequencies that are not available in the standard code list

CreditInterestTierBandSet.description: The group of tiers or bands for which credit interest can be applied.

sourceCurrency.description: ISO 4217 currency code denoting the currency of the creditor

targetCurrency.description: ISO 4217 currency code denoting the currency of the debtor

unitCurrency.description: ISO 4217 currency code denoting the currency used to set the exchange rate (GBP is the unit currency in the conversion of 1 GBP = x CUR)

IDVerificationCheck.description: Identity verification criteria that the account holder will need to meet to take out the PCA product

GeographicCoordinates1.description: Location on the earth specified by two numbers representing vertical and horizontal position.

Eligibility.description: Eligibility details for this product i.e. the criteria that an accountholder has to meet in order to be eligible for the PCA product.

GeoLocation1.description: Geographic location of the ATM specified by geographic coordinates or UTM coordinates.

InlineResponse2001OtherAccessibility.description: Enter a new code , name and description for any other ATM accessibility options

ATMMapServiceLinks.description: Links on popular map services pointing the ATM Location on the earth.

userUuid.description: Uuid of the application user who will authorise access to their data. Either the userUuid or applicationUserId must be provided.

applicationUserId.description: Descriptive identifier for the application user.Either the userUuid or applicationUserId must be provided.

ResidencyEligibility.description: Countries in which an accountholder can reside and, therefore, be eligible to open an account

OverdraftOverdraftFeeChargeCap.description: Details about any caps (maximum charges) that apply to a particular fee/charge

ATMOpenDataBrand.description: Brand of the Acquirer of transactions captured by the ATM

CreditCheck.description: Credit check criteria that the account holder will need to meet to take out the PCA product

CreditInterest.description: Details about the interest that may be payable to the PCA account holders

id.description: Transaction Id returned by the institution if present

date.description: Transaction date as defined by the institution

bookingDateTime.description: Date and (if available) time that transaction is posted

valueDateTime.description: The actual or expected date and time transaction is cleared

amount.description: Deprecated. Use the amount value in `transactionAmount` instead

currency.description: Deprecated. Use the currency value in `transactionAmount` instead

chargeDetails.description: If present, contains details of any charges applied during this transaction

description.description: Unstructured text containing details of the transaction. Usage varies according to the institution

transactionInformation.description: Further information related to the transaction. Usage varies according to the institution

balance.description: Running account balance after transaction has been applied

supplementaryData.description: Additional information that can not be captured in the structured fields and/or any other specific block.

userUuid.description: Uuid of the application user who will authorise access to their data. Either the userUuid or applicationUserId must be provided.

applicationUserId.description: Descriptive identifier for the application user.Either the userUuid or applicationUserId must be provided.

PostalAddress1.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific address, as defined by postal services or in free format text.

executionDateTime.description: Execution datetime for the bulk payments

originatorIdentificationNumber.description: Required field for AIB bulk payments

OverdraftOtherFeeType.description: Other fee type code which is not available in the standard code set

dateTime.description: Timestamp of the last change of the balance amount

creditLineIncluded.description: Indicates whether or not the credit line is included in the balance

Branch.description: Information that locates and identifies a specific branch of a financial institution.

OtherResidencyType.description: Other residency type which is not available in standard code list.

OtherCalculationFrequency.description: Other calculation frequency which is not available in the standard code set.

LocationOtherLocationCategory.description: Enter a new code , name and description for any other location category

CoreProduct.description: Core feature of the PCA product which can be associated to a particular Marketing State

EligibilityOtherEligibility.description: Other eligibility which is not covered by the main eligibility of the PCA product
